modName: Bigger Heartland Aspens for Beyond Skyrim Bruma
summary: 30% bigger aspen trees for the green heartland forest in southern Bruma.  Billboards available for use with DynDOLOD and TES5LODGen.  Updated 8/9/18 cleaned and optimized meshes
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Bigger Heartland Aspens
 
[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/28ec90f940b64cdd54342a43cb4226ba/tumblr_ot3x7szzgT1s2ptqso2_540.jpg[/img]

for Beyond Skyrim: Bruma[/size]





[size=4]The heartland forest of southern Bruma now has 30% bigger green aspen trees[/size]


[size=4][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/5f8312726ea57d21ff49918f40b72524/tumblr_ot3x7szzgT1s2ptqso1_540.jpg[/img][/size]



[size=4]This mod does not affect the vanilla aspen trees, only the green aspens in Cyrodiil[/size]




[size=4]Beyond Skyrim: Bruma required.  Currently only loose files are available for this mod.  This mod does not have an esp[/size]





[size=4]Billboards are available in the miscellaneous section for use with TES5LODGen or DynDOLOD.  Using either of these two programs will allow various tree mods to be compatible with the Bruma worldspace and also this mod.  Note: do NOT attempt to generate Object LOD for BSHeartland worldspace as errors will occur.  Only generate tree LOD.  See [url=http://forum.step-project.com/topic/11997-dynamic-distant-objects-lod-dyndolod-226/?p=204312]this post[/url] by Sheson for more info[/size]


[size=4]If you plan to generate tree LOD then you will need billboards for the Beyond Skyrim Bruma world space named  (BSHeartland) available [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85024/?]here[/url]






[size=5]Installation:[/size]



[size=4]- manually or with mod manager, and overwrite when prompted[/size]

[size=4]-Install main file first and then, if applicable, install the patch for the combination of landscape overhauls you are using[/size]
[size=4] [/size]
[size=4]- patches available for the following overhaul combinations (more on the way)[/size]
[size=4]Skyrim Flora Overhaul (SFO)[/size]
[size=4]SFO + Realistic Aspen Trees (RAT)
The Blue Forest[/size]







[size=4]Credits:[/size]
[size=4]gkb for green aspen meshes[/size]
[size=4]beyond skyrim team[/size]
[size=4]zilav for the amazing billboard generator[/size][/center][left][/left]
author: mobiusbelmont
